title: Champion Concept OVERLOAD
body:
Just a few of my champion concepts to date, as well as a template for newcomers to the concept business.
Let me know which one you think is best.

replies.body:
You definitely put your heart and soul into this but a few problems ill pick out

1) all the champions follow the same base idea of other champions. This offers limited uniqueness
2) personally i don't think anyone would support bulling by buying ralph or xirsi the 
Poet
3) some scaling is really uneven 720 shield can be oh so slightly broken
4) increasing movement or AS isn't always the best choice for a W 

 All in all great job but think of more attractive ideas like ........................ No clue??!!!!!

GJ

Thanks for your input, and I love that you've pointed out problems with my work.

In response to your points,
1) It's kind of hard to build in new mechanics when you have no clue of whether they're even possible, but I will try to be more diverse with my concepts.
2) It was really just a blanket idea, not to be truly taken seriously.
3) Thanks for pointing that out, will lower the scaling on that.
4) It's always the W that I get stuck on, because that ability is usually left as a steroid/utility, and there are only a set number of stats in the game which can be boosted (I can count 12).

Once again, thanks. Your input has been taken into account in this design process.
The first guy I read has so much sustain, it would be unbearable
